cmake_minimum_required (VERSION 3.5.0)
project(R-vendor)

include(ExternalProject)


ExternalProject_Add(
  zlib
  SOURCE_DIR ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/zlib-1.2.11
  CONFIGURE_COMMAND ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/configure-scripts/zlib.sh ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR} zlib-1.2.11
  BUILD_IN_SOURCE 1
)
